title: 1840's font
content:
Anyone got any idea if there is something similar out there to this? Sorry about the bad scan. I swear I have seen something quite close, just can’t locate it.

Many thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071123092758im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type_4494.jpg)

author: Rob Sutton
